participant_1.background:
I volunteer at the red cross on the weekends.
I am married with 2 kids.
I do yoga three times a week.
I am a high school teacher.

participant_2.background:
I am a french girl , but i moved to the us last year.
I do not have too many friends in the us yet , but i am going to summer camp and i hope to make friends then ! i also think that i may make friends as soccer in the fall.
I like to play soccer , draw and read asteria.
I live with my parents and my little brother.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
Hello, I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asteria.
That's great! I love to play soccer too. What position do you play?
I play forward. I like to score goals.
Nice! I play midfielder. I like to set up my teammates for goals.
That's a good position too. I like it when my teammates set me up for goals.
Me too! So, what do you like to draw?
I like to draw nature and animals. I also like to draw people, but I'm not very good at it yet.
That's great! I like to draw nature too. I'm not very good at it either, but I enjoy it.
Me too! I think it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. So, what do you like to read?
I love to read fantasy books. I think they're so much fun.
That's great! I love to read fantasy books too. I think they're so creative and imaginative.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good fantasy world.
Me too! I think it's a great way to escape from the real world for a little while.
Me too! So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading the Mistborn series by Brandon Sanderson.
I love that series! It's so good.
I agree! I'm really enjoying it.
So, what do you like to do for fun when you're not volunteering, playing soccer, drawing, or reading?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to watch movies, go to the gym, and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
It is! I love spending time with my family and friends.
Me too! I think it's important to have a strong support system.
I agree! It's so important to have people who are there for you.
Me too! So, what do you think of the US so far?
I love it! It's such a great country.
Me too! I'm so glad I moved here.
I'm glad you moved here too! It's a great place to live.
